text: Mickey Dale Beebe (better known as Mike Beebe; born December 28, 1946) is an American politician. He was the Governor of Arkansas from 2007 to 2015. He was elected in 2006 as governor and re-elected in 2010. He is a member of the Democratic Party of the United States. Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Governors of Arkansas Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Mike Beebe
